Kobi Kassal, Theatrely: Where I’m fascinated is that spark the production seems to have found over here in the States. I can’t necessarily pinpoint what particlualy changed but the world Frecknall has created now works for me. The team has produced a stunning feat the likes of which Broadway has not experienced in a while. If London is any indication, we are in for a long healthy run with exciting new stars every few months, and I look forward to experiencing the wonderment of the Kit Kat Club again and again. Amelia Merrill, New York Theatre Guide: Kander and Ebb's Cabaret is a much-loved and -revived property such that its twists may not be secrets anymore.
